title: Sunrise Bay
description: Vivien Blake runs the surgery department at Sunrise General, a small hospital in a coastal community plagued by a centuries-old curse. Crystals, body swaps, and the longest running demonic possession on daytime television.
quote: How dare you make me kill my father twice!
altHero: Vivien Blake and Trystan in doctor’s coats
alt4: Vivien walks away as Trystan looks excited behind her
